new.description: Add new boilerplate repo to be saved

args.name: description
args.description: Specify boilerplate repo brief description, should be in double quote("") (Optional)

args.name: name
args.description: specify boilerplate name to be removed (optional)

args.name: name
args.description: specify boilerplate name to be used (optional)

args.name: clonePath
args.description: specify the directory this boilerplate should be cloned (Optional, default to "." or current directory)
